availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Eli Crow (Jessamine County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant)

body.p: Jessamine County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant. Maryland native. Married to Martha Crow. Father of Elizabeth Crow, Nancy L. Crow, William D. Crow, Eli C. Crow, Henry Crow and Calvin Crow. Farmer in Jessamine County, Kentucky in 1850. Merchant in Nicholasville, Jessamine County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, District 2, p. 72B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, Nicholasville, p. 116.
